Name: Red Holzman
Note: As head coach; the number represents his 613 victories coaching the Knicks.

Name: Moses Malone
Note: Not officially retired, but taken out of circulation.

Name: Hal Greer
Note: During his first five seasons (1958–1963), the team was known as the Syracuse Nationals.

Name: Billy Cunningham
Note: Also served as head coach (1977–1985); briefly unretired for Charles Barkley in the 1991–92 season.

Name: Kevin Johnson
Note: Retired in 1998, but came back before the end of the 1999–2000 season before retiring again; currently the mayor of Sacramento.

Name: Dan Majerle
Note: Formerly an assistant head coach for the Phoenix Suns (2008–2013).

Name: Tom Chambers
Note: Currently an announcer for Suns games.

Name: Alvan Adams
Note: Number unretired for Grant Hill from 2007–2012.
